name: Apex Growth Infrastructure Methodology
core_philosophy: Marketing should operate as infrastructure -- integrated systems that compound over time -- not as disconnected campaigns with unpredictable outcomes.

ai_powered_execution.description: Claude-based AI agents handle research, content generation, optimization, and analysis at speed and consistency that human teams alone cannot achieve.
key_capabilities: Automated quality assurance with human oversight

structured_experimentation.description: Every marketing action is treated as a hypothesis. We measure, learn, and iterate weekly. No guesswork, no vanity metrics.

steps: Primary metric and guardrail metric definition

transparent_reporting.description: Clients see exactly what is happening, what is working, and why. No black boxes, no vague metrics.

reporting_cadence.weekly: Full performance report with KPI tracking
reporting_cadence.monthly: Comprehensive review with ROI analysis and billing

engine_model.description: Each 'engine' is a self-contained growth system focused on a specific outcome. Engines run continuously, learning and improving. They are not projects with end dates -- they are infrastructure that compounds.

engines.name: Content Engine
engines.purpose: Authority-building content that drives organic traffic and establishes thought leadership
typical_deliverables: Content calendar aligned with search demand

engines.name: SEO Architecture Engine
engines.purpose: Technical and on-page SEO that builds sustainable organic visibility

engines.name: Paid Performance Engine
engines.purpose: AI-optimized paid campaigns that improve weekly
typical_deliverables: Weekly A/B testing of ads and audiences

engines.name: Social Media Engine
engines.purpose: Brand presence and community building across platforms

engines.name: Email Nurture Engine
engines.purpose: Lead nurturing and customer retention through email sequences
typical_deliverables: A/B testing of subjects and content

engines.name: Local Visibility Engine
engines.purpose: Dominate local search and directory presence

engines.name: Conversion Optimization Engine
engines.purpose: Systematic improvement of website conversion rates

engines.name: Growth Ops Engine
engines.purpose: Strategic layer that coordinates all engines and drives compounding growth

process: Brand Voice Agent checks tone and terminology consistency
Quality Gate scores on 4 dimensions (completeness, accuracy, actionability, formatting)
Combined score >= 7/10 passes to human review
Human review for strategic alignment and nuance
Client delivery with revision cycle if needed
